name: eles.markovClustering
descr: Considering only the elements in the calling collection, run the [Markov cluster algorithm](https://micans.org/mcl/) of the nodes.

fields.name: attributes: [ function(edge) ... ]
fields.descr: An array of attribute functions, each of which returns a numeric attribute value for the specified edge.  Attributes are used to cluster the nodes; i.e. the attributes of an edge indicate similarity between its nodes.

fields.name: expandFactor
fields.descr: A number that affects time of computation and cluster granularity to some extent: `M * M` (default `2`)

fields.name: inflateFactor
fields.descr: A number that affects cluster granularity (the greater the value, the more clusters): `M(i,j) / E(j)` (default `2`)

fields.name: multFactor
fields.descr: Optional number of self loops for each node. Use a neutral value to improve cluster computations (default `1`).

fields.name: maxIterations
fields.descr: Maximum number of iterations of the MCL algorithm in a single run (default `20`).
